title: Under the Wave off Kanagawa influence

content.question: The influence that Japanese works such as Hokusai’s Under the Wave off Kanagawa (Kanagawa oki nami ura) had on Mary Cassatt’s work including The Coiffure can be seen in Cassatt’s use of

choices.label: figural posture, dramatic lighting, and intricate details
flattened forms, planes of solid color, and rhythmic patterns
delicate shading, angularity, and asymmetrical balance
geometric abstraction, bright colors, and twisted perspective

content.answer: flattened forms, planes of solid color, and rhythmic patterns

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.3: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain the influence of a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) on other artistic production within or across cultures.
